Summary: slightly curved line of a group of star-like dots
divs: Sighting Detailsi was standing in the front yard of a subdivision on 9 mile and Pontiac trail when i looked to the sky. i was looking at an odd shaped consolation to the west toward Ann Arbor when a form caught my eye. i obsirved a slightly curved line made up of star like lights moving across the sky from my south-west to my north-west. the figure disappeared behind trees and houses until i lost it in the horizon. the figure was the same color emitted from stars and it appeared as it was moving faster than the normal aircraft. please reply if you seen the same thing, i wish i had been able to capture this on video
trends: There has been one other sighting in South Lyon
There were no other sightings in South Lyon on or around August 6th 2012
